hevs.gdx2d.lib.physics

Interface BodyInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPhysicsObject, PhysicsBox, PhysicsCircle, PhysicsStaticBox

    public interface BodyInterface
    An interface for the Box2D bodies so that we can work in pixels units and not in meters. Used in AbstractPhysicsObject.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry
